about_the_game:
Le Lac d’or (The Golden Lake) is a 25 acre venue surrounded by woodland and nestled in the French countryside. This mature lake is an ideal holiday venue with three log cabins each with their own pegs accommodating up to 4 anglers for you to fish from.



The size of the fish that reside here is the most impressive feature with some huge specimens lurking beneath the surface waiting to be caught. The lake introduces Koi Carp to Euro Fishing for the first time as well as specimen sized Carp, Catfish, Tench, Bream and Roach.



Current lake records stand at 71lb 8oz for Carp, 15lb 2oz for Bream, 11lb 3oz for Tench and 4lb 1oz for Roach. Most impressive are the catfish with several breaking the 100lb barrier with the biggest currently being 126lbs 3oz.

Key Features of this venue include:
  • French holiday venue featuring log cabin pegs to fish from
  • 25 new boss fish to try to catch including Catfish over 100lb
  • 10 new achievements to unlock
  • Over 500 fish including a new species – Koi Carp.
detailed_description:
Le Lac d’or (The Golden Lake) is a 25 acre venue surrounded by woodland and nestled in the French countryside. This mature lake is an ideal holiday venue with three log cabins each with their own pegs accommodating up to 4 anglers for you to fish from.



The size of the fish that reside here is the most impressive feature with some huge specimens lurking beneath the surface waiting to be caught. The lake introduces Koi Carp to Euro Fishing for the first time as well as specimen sized Carp, Catfish, Tench, Bream and Roach.



Current lake records stand at 71lb 8oz for Carp, 15lb 2oz for Bream, 11lb 3oz for Tench and 4lb 1oz for Roach. Most impressive are the catfish with several breaking the 100lb barrier with the biggest currently being 126lbs 3oz.

Key Features of this venue include:
  • French holiday venue featuring log cabin pegs to fish from
  • 25 new boss fish to try to catch including Catfish over 100lb
  • 10 new achievements to unlock
  • Over 500 fish including a new species – Koi Carp.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 64bit / 8 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 1 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 460 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
